docs.snippet: On a runoff ballot influenced by Muhammad Ali's elimination, Ken Buchanan, the world lightweight champion from Scotland, outpointed Joe Frazier by one vote yesterday to win the Edward J. Neil Memorial Award as 1970's fighter of the year....
docs.lead_paragraph: On a runoff ballot influenced by Muhammad Ali's elimination, Ken Buchanan, the world lightweight champion from Scotland, outpointed Joe Frazier by one vote yesterday to win the Edward J. Neil Memorial Award as 1970's fighter of the year.
docs.abstract: Meets; K Buchanan voted fighter of yr; other award winners noted

headline.main: BUCHAHAN VOTED FIGHTER OF YEAR; Edges Frazier After Ali Is Eliminated on First Ballot

docs.snippet: The American designers are paying absolutely no attention to the fact that the French ones have decided the long skirt is a dead issue, for summer anyway. Curious, in view of the rapidity with which they followed the French hemlines downward less ...
docs.lead_paragraph: The American designers are paying absolutely no attention to the fact that the French ones have decided the long skirt is a dead issue, for summer anyway. Curious, in view of the rapidity with which they followed the French hemlines downward less than a year ago.

headline.main: Seventh Avenue Still Dodging the Issue

docs.snippet: " But if you wanna see old folks, you're in the wrong hall tonight," sang out 25 vintage players in a mirrored rehearsal studio at 1755 Broadway. They sat on three benches, facing the musical director of "70, Girls, 70," Oscar Kosarin....
docs.lead_paragraph: " But if you wanna see old folks, you're in the wrong hall tonight," sang out 25 vintage players in a mirrored rehearsal studio at 1755 Broadway. They sat on three benches, facing the musical director of "70, Girls, 70," Oscar Kosarin.

docs.snippet: Oscar Mayer  Co., Inc., the nation's sixth largest meat packer in terms of sales, achieved record sales and earnings in the first fiscal quarter ended Jan. 30, it was reported yesterday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oscar Mayer Co., Inc., the nation's sixth largest meat packer in terms of sales, achieved record sales and earnings in the first fiscal quarter ended Jan. 30, it was reported yesterday.

headline.main: PROFIT HITS PEAK FOR OSCAR MAYER; Sales of Meat Packer Were Also Quarter Record

docs.snippet: MILWAUKEE, Feb. 13 (UPI) -The Milwaukee Bucks caught the Chicago Bulls with a little over three minutes to play to post a 103-96 National Basketball Association victory today....
docs.lead_paragraph: MILWAUKEE, Feb. 13 (UPI) -The Milwaukee Bucks caught the Chicago Bulls with a little over three minutes to play to post a 103-96 National Basketball Association victory today.

docs.snippet: Formation of the Committee to Unite America, Inc., aiming "to halt further erosion of this nation's moral standards, institutions and common purposes," was announced here yesterday by its president, Lady Malcolm Douglas-Hamilton, the former Natali...
docs.lead_paragraph: Formation of the Committee to Unite America, Inc., aiming "to halt further erosion of this nation's moral standards, institutions and common purposes," was announced here yesterday by its president, Lady Malcolm Douglas-Hamilton, the former Natalie Wales.
docs.abstract: Lady Douglas-Hamilton announces formation of Com to Unite Amer to 'halt further erosion of nation's moral standards, insts and common purposes'; she is pres; announcement names 63 founding members and sponsors, including Adm Radford, Gen Wedemeyer, Drs E Teller and E P Wigner, ex-Repr Judd; others listed

headline.main: 63 FORM A GROUP TO GUARD MORALS; ' Unite America' Aims to End 'Erosion' of U.S. Standards

docs.snippet: From Florida to California, baseball training camps will sprout in the next few days and, as the National League prepares for its 96th season, free-for-alls loom in both the Eastern and Western Divisions....
docs.lead_paragraph: From Florida to California, baseball training camps will sprout in the next few days and, as the National League prepares for its 96th season, free-for-alls loom in both the Eastern and Western Divisions.
